About
Thai city on the east coast of the Gulf of Siam, known for its beaches. Back in the 1960s, it was a quiet fishing village, and now attracts thousands of tourists thanks to resort hotels, high-rise residential buildings, shopping centers, bars with pop shows and clubs open around the clock. Not far from the city on the hillside is the temple of Phra Yai with a gold statue of Buddha 18 meters high. Pattaya has several golf courses with a unique landscape, with a wonderful view of the bay.

About
Thai city on the east coast of the Gulf of Siam, known for its beaches. Back in the 1960s, it was a quiet fishing village, and now attracts thousands of tourists thanks to resort hotels, high-rise residential buildings, shopping centers, bars with pop shows and clubs open around the clock. Not far from the city on the hillside is the temple of Phra Yai with a gold statue of Buddha 18 meters high. Pattaya has several golf courses with a unique landscape, with a wonderful view of the bay.
